name: Flex
shortDescription: A fitness tracker created as part of a Software Engineering course at the University of Pittsburgh.
longDescription: Flex is a responsive web application that allows users to track their weight, intake, and workouts while monitoring their progress to goals over time. The frontend was developed using React, and the backend uses Java Spring Boot and MySQL. I worked on this project with 4 other students from the University of Pittsburgh as part of a Software Engineering course. Part of the requirements for this project was to use Agile Scrum as the basis for our software development methodology. We performed requirements analysis, created diagrams (including class, activity, use case, etc.), and planned and tracked our progress using backlogs and user stories maintained in a Trello board. My primary responsibility for the project was to design and implement most of the frontend. I created prototypes in Figma, then transferred these into a working app with React. I also created the logo and helped to develop APIs and decide the structure and scope of the app. [CHALLENGES]

name: Chat App
shortDescription: A group chat application featuring accounts, instant messaging, replies, reactions, and more.
longDescription: Chat App is a responsive web application that allows users to create accounts with email/password or their Google account, create and join group chats, send and receive messages, and reply and react to messages. The application interface was created using Flutter. I also used Firebase as the database to store users, groups, and messages, as well as to securely authenticate users. This project was designed and developed entirely by me, with the goal of learning as much about Flutter as possible while using Firebase for the first time. I also used Adobe XD to develop and compare design ideas. Chat App is deployed live [https://chatapp-ba297.web.app/]here.

name: Music App
shortDescription: A music-based mobile social media app created as part of a course at the University of Pittsburgh.
longDescription: Music App is a music-oriented cross-platform social media app. Its core functionalities include creating text posts, uploading videos of song covers/original songs, commenting on and liking posts, setting a favorite song, album, and artist, searching for other users and songs, and following other users. Users are also able to pin posts on their profile and update their name and bio. I created the app with two others using Flutter as part of a course at the University of Pittsburgh. My responsibilities for the project included creating wireframes using Adobe XD and designing the look and feel of the app, helping create personas, and creating the Homepage and Search pages
